about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant life of the big city in PACK MY STUFF: NEW CITY! Here you will become a master of packing packages and experience breathtaking adventures.

Embark on exciting new missions that take your main PACK MY STUFF game to a whole new level. Feel the thrill as you chase through the streets of the metropolis to secure your precious cargoes.

The streets are full of dangers and obstacles to overcome. From daring chases with rival packing experts to tricky puzzles that will test your wits, no two days are the same in NEW CITY.

Become the hero of your own story as you fight your way through the maze of skyscrapers and hidden alleys. Every step brings you closer to the ultimate goal: perfect wrapping and on-time delivery of packages.

The streets are full of dangers and obstacles to overcome. From daring chases with rival packing experts to tricky puzzles that will test your wits, no two days are the same in NEW CITY.

Become the hero of your own story as you fight your way through the maze of skyscrapers and hidden alleys. Every step brings you closer to the ultimate goal: perfect wrapping and on-time delivery of packages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DX 9.0c
